snippet.title: MARGO - On the Brink Trailer (New)
snippet.description:
MARGO - On the Brink new trailer.

Dive into the fragmented worlds of "The Brink" in search for truth in this 2D turn-based RPG. Draw strength from mysterious beings called the Lost Whispers and pay the ultimate price to recover the long lost truth.

Wishlist NOW : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2180930/MARGO__On_the_Brink/
